question: Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your houseflat. Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letter, Explain the reason for the noise Apologise for the noise Describe what action you will take
text: I was shocked to know that you were disturbed by the noise from my flat recently, and I am writing to apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Since I surprisingly found out that I was pregnant last week, which my husband and I have not made any preparations in advance, our flat was in  urgent need of upgrading, such as adding protections near the window and decorating a baby room.

I am really sorry about the noise created, and I have rescheduled with my workers to make sure that they will only proceed with the upgrading project during the daytime on workdays, so it will not bother your rest when you return from work. Furthermore, I have requested an additional worker to speed up the process, so that this project will finish in two days at most.
I truly hope that you could accept my apologies, and your kind understanding will be appreciated.
